data.event: The Thursday announcement brought the first public acknowledgment that Democrats would increase taxes to help balance the budget.

event.title: changes to his budget in the next week

data.event: He is to announce changes to his budget in the next week to 10 days, taking into account recent economic changes.

data.event: Then, Monday night, a committee page demanded to see credentials from a photographer â “ two hours after a House leadership spokesman assured the media that no credentials would be needed to cover committee meetings.
